div.style: display: inline-block; background-color: #d9e0e7; padding: 6px; margin: 4px; border: 1px solid #8da1b4; border-radius: 5px; line-height: 60%

div.p: description: If child or person has not been vaccinated, give Pneumococcal vaccine minimum age 6 weeks old

blockquote.p: title: Immunize Patient for Pneumococcal - No Doses
description: Provide Pneumococcal immunizations – using the "PCV immunization 2p+1 schedule – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (2 dose scheme)

tr.td: Should vaccinate patient for Pneumococcal because no doses in a 2 dose scheme
Should vaccinate patient for Pneumococcal because no doses in a 2 dose scheme
"Country is following a 2 dose scheme" = TRUE
Should vaccinate patient for Pneumococcal because no doses in a 2 dose scheme

blockquote.p: title: Immunize Patient for Pneumococcal - 1 Dose
description: Provide Pneumococcal immunizations – using the "PCV immunization 2p+1 schedule – 1 PREVIOUS" schedule (2 dose scheme)

tr.td: Should vaccinate patient for Pneumococcal because 1 dose in a 2 dose scheme
Should vaccinate patient for Pneumococcal because 1 dose in a 2 dose scheme
Should vaccinate patient for Pneumococcal because 1 dose in a 2 dose scheme
"Country is using a 2 dose scheme" = TRUE
Should vaccinate patient for Pneumococcal because 1 dose in a 2 dose scheme

blockquote.p: title: Immunize Patient for Pneumococcal - Booster
description: Provide Pneumococcal immunizations – using the "PCV immunization 2p+1 schedule – 2 PREVIOUS" schedule (2 dose scheme + booster)

tr.td: Should vaccinate patient for Pneumococcal booster because 2 doses in a 2+1 dose scheme
Should vaccinate patient for Pneumococcal booster because 2 doses in a 2+1 dose scheme
Should vaccinate patient for Pneumococcal booster because 2 doses in a 2+1 dose scheme
"Country is using a 2 dose scheme" = TRUE
Should vaccinate patient for Pneumococcal booster because 2 doses in a 2+1 dose scheme

blockquote.p: title: Immunize Patient for Pneumococcal - No Dose
description: Provide Pneumococcal immunizations – using the "PCV immunization 3p+0 schedule – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (3 dose scheme)

tr.td: Should vaccinate patient for Pneumococcal because No doses in a 3 dose scheme
Should vaccinate patient for Pneumococcal because No doses in a 3 dose scheme

description: Provide Pneumococcal immunizations – using the "Catch-up PCV immunization – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (1 dose scheme)

blockquote.p: title: Immunize Patient for Pneumococcal - HIV positive and preterm who received their 3 doses before 12 months of age
description: Provide Pneumococcal immunizations – using the "PCV immunization – Booster for HIV+ and preterm" schedule (1 booster dose in second year of life)

tr.td: Should vaccinate patient for Pneumococcal Booster in second year of life because HIV infected or preterm who completed 3-dose series before 12 months of age
Should vaccinate patient for Pneumococcal Booster in second year of life because HIV infected or preterm who completed 3-dose series before 12 months of age
"Age when Patient received 3rd dose in Months" < 12
